title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 17, 1861
summary: Hotchkiss writes about camp life. He discusses a recent battle that resulted in the death of General Garnett and the capture, by the Yankees, of hundreds of Confederate troops, many of whom were then paroled.
keywords: Prisons/Prisoners, Death/Casualties, Battle Description, Camp Life, American Civil War
